00079 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00080 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::UpdateModel() const
00081 {
00082        I_ASSERT(IsGuiCreated());
00083 
00084        i2d::CPolygon* objectPtr = GetObjectPtr();
00085        I_ASSERT(objectPtr != NULL);
00086 
00087        istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(objectPtr);
00088 
00089        int count = CoordsTable->rowCount();
00090        objectPtr->Clear();
00091 
00092        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
00093               double x = CoordsTable->item(i, 0)->text().toDouble();
00094               double y = CoordsTable->item(i, 1)->text().toDouble();
00095        
00096               objectPtr->InsertNode(i2d::CVector2d(x, y));
00097        }
00098 }

00103 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00104 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnInsertNode()
00105 {
00106        iqt::CSignalBlocker block(CoordsTable);
00107 
00108        int row = CoordsTable->currentRow();
00109        if (row < 0){
00110               row = CoordsTable->rowCount();
00111               
00112               CoordsTable->setRowCount(row + 1);
00113        }
00114        else{
00115               CoordsTable->insertRow(row);
00116        }
00117 
00118        CoordsTable->setItem(row, 0, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(0)));
00119        CoordsTable->setItem(row, 1, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(0)));
00120        CoordsTable->setCurrentCell(row, 0);
00121 
00122        DoUpdateModel();
00123 }
00124 
00125 
00126 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00127 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnRemoveNode()
00128 {
00129        int row = CoordsTable->currentRow();
00130        if (row >= 0){
00131               iqt::CSignalBlocker block(CoordsTable);
00132 
00133               CoordsTable->removeRow(row);
00134 
00135               DoUpdateModel();
00136        }
00137 }

00160 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00161 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::UpdateGui(int /*updateFlags*/)
00162 {
00163        I_ASSERT(IsGuiCreated());
00164 
00165        i2d::CPolygon* objectPtr = GetObjectPtr();
00166        if (objectPtr != NULL){
00167               CoordsTable->clearContents();
00168 
00169               int count = objectPtr->GetNodesCount();
00170               CoordsTable->setRowCount(count);
00171 
00172               for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
00173                      i2d::CVector2d coord = objectPtr->GetNode(i);
00174                      CoordsTable->setItem(i, 0, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(coord.GetX())));
00175                      CoordsTable->setItem(i, 1, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(coord.GetY())));
00176               }
00177        }
00178 }

00184 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnGuiCreated()

00191        CoordsTable->setItemDelegateForColumn(0, columnDelegate);
00192        CoordsTable->setItemDelegateForColumn(1, columnDelegate);
00193 }
